emails.subject: Arts Celebration & Camp Info
emails.summary: Stop procrastinating and get these dates in your calendar RIGHT NOW. Your kid's Arts Celebration (May 27-30) conflicts with your work presentation, and summer camps fill up fast. The families who plan ahead get the spots - the ones who don't get stuck scrambling in June.

emails.subject: Appointment Confirmation: Tomorrow 2:30 PM
emails.summary: This is happening in 18 hours and you haven't thought about it once, have you? Your child's annual checkup determines their school clearance, sports eligibility, and vaccine compliance. Missing this means rebooking, dealing with school holds, and explaining to your kid why they can't play soccer.

emails.subject: Order #123-4567890-1234567 has shipped
emails.summary: Your organic baby formula is coming tomorrow between 2-6 PM. Here's what most parents screw up: they're not home, the package gets stolen, baby goes hungry, and you're driving to CVS at 11 PM paying triple the price. Be home or arrange pickup.

emails.subject: Parent-Teacher Conference: This Friday
emails.summary: Emma is excelling in math but struggling with reading comprehension. Let's discuss strategies to support her at home during our Friday 3PM conference.

emails.subject: Q1 Planning Meeting - Monday 9:00 AM
emails.summary: Critical budget decisions for your team's headcount and project priorities. Come prepared with your resource requests and Q4 performance metrics.

emails.subject: Family Dinner - Saturday 6 PM
emails.summary: Grandma specifically requested you bring the kids - she has early birthday presents for Emma and wants to hear about Jake's soccer tournament win. This isn't just dinner, it's relationship maintenance that your kids will remember forever. Don't you dare cancel last minute because work 'came up.'

emails.summary: Your order for kids' birthday party supplies is ready for pickup at Target Circle 360.

emails.subject: Vaccination Reminder: Due Next Week
emails.summary: Emma's second HPV dose is overdue by 3 days. Missing this window could reset her vaccination series, requiring her to start over. Please schedule immediately.

emails.subject: Volunteer Needed: Book Fair Next Week
emails.summary: Jake's class is competing for the 'Most Parent Volunteers' pizza party. They're currently in 3rd place and need 2 more parent signups to win. Your kid is watching how involved you are compared to other parents. This is about more than books - it's about showing up.

emails.subject: Benefits Enrollment Deadline: February 15
emails.summary: Don't forget to complete your benefits enrollment by February 15th to avoid losing coverage.

emails.subject: Your grocery order arrives in 2 hours
emails.summary: Fresh organic groceries including strawberries, avocados, and sourdough bread will arrive between 3-4 PM.

emails.subject: Practice Cancelled Tomorrow - Field Conditions
emails.summary: Due to wet field conditions, tomorrow's soccer practice is cancelled. Next practice is Thursday.

emails.subject: New shows you might like this week
emails.summary: Check out 'The Crown' season 6, 'Stranger Things' behind the scenes, and trending documentaries.

emails.subject: Your camping gear rental is confirmed
emails.summary: 4-person tent, sleeping bags, and camping stove rental for February 14-16 weekend trip.

emails.subject: Client Presentation Moved to Wednesday 2 PM
emails.summary: The Acme Corp presentation has been rescheduled from Tuesday to Wednesday at 2 PM. Slides are ready for review.

emails.subject: Piano Recital: February 20th at 7 PM
emails.summary: Emma's piano recital is confirmed for February 20th. She'll be performing 'FÃ¼r Elise' - 3rd piece of the evening.

emails.subject: Reminder: Cleaning appointment Thursday 10 AM
emails.summary: Routine dental cleaning and fluoride treatment for Emma scheduled this Thursday morning.

emails.subject: Kids Birthday Party Planning
emails.summary: Let's coordinate on decorations and food for Tommy's 8th birthday party next Saturday. I'll handle the cake!

emails.subject: 5 people viewed your profile this week
emails.summary: Your profile had increased activity. Connect with Sarah from TechCorp and 4 others who viewed your profile.

emails.summary: Seasonal vegetables, artisanal breads, and local honey available at this weekend's market.
